course_description: Every semester. Credit, variable; may be repeated for a maximum of twelve hours of credit (does not count toward the major). Open to junior and senior English majors with approval of the coordinator. Applied learning in a supervised work experience, using skills related to the English major.
sections: Class Nbr: 2424, Section #: 1, Type: DIS, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: P. Kelleher, Status: Open
